pageContent: Aims: To develop and internally validate a new simplified model 'prostascore' to help predict the outcomes of treatment-naive patients with advanced prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
[Clinical studies of subcapsular orchiectomy with an intracapsular testicular prosthesis--improving the quality of life in patients with prostatic cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/2506386/
